replies.txt_content: 刷怪笼放置后默认为猪，可以用刷怪蛋右击改为其他生物

replies.author: Brave_boy
replies.txt_content:
/setblock ~ ~1 ~ minecraft:mob_spawner 0 replace {EntityId:Wolf,SpawnCount:2,SpawnRange:2,RequiredPlayerRange:24,Delay:10,MinSpawnDelay:10,MaxSpawnDelay:100,MaxNearbyEntities:50,SpawnData:{}}
[防止一个wolf刷怪笼][狼]

replies.author: penjing
replies.txt_content: 默认都是变猪的 要自己指令改变
可以用对应的刷怪蛋右键刷怪笼修改刷怪笼类型

replies.author: 向文
replies.txt_content:
默认都是猪
可以用刷怪蛋改

replies.author: Wither_jun
replies.txt_content: 刷怪笼默认放下去当然是猪啊 你可以用刷怪蛋改啊
新版本的刷怪笼是要用刷怪蛋的
